title: GuideDAO Lottery
description: Win a GuideDAO Pass! Join our blockchain lottery with fair odds, transparent smart contract, and a chance to become a part of the astonishing DAO. We are a community of crypto enthusiasts, developers, cryptographers, engineers, auditors and investors who learn from each other and build teams. Buy tickets, increase your chances to join and improve your skills!

home.disclaimer_text_prefix: Providing contact details is optional, but they are required to reach out the winner. The data is securely encrypted with
home.disclaimer_text_suffix: and is only accessible to the administrator.

about.title: About
about.intro: GuideDAO Lottery is a student-built, open-source project to fairly raffle access to the GuideDAO platform via an NFT Pass. The goal is production-grade code with transparent smart contracts and a simple, friendly interface.
about.bullet_open: Open-source and transparent: the lottery runs on Ethereum-compatible networks via smart contracts.
about.bullet_vrf: Fair winner selection: uses verifiable randomness (VRF) to pick the winner.
about.bullet_refund: Flexible participation: tickets can be refunded (exited) before the lottery ends.
about.bullet_nft: Winner reward: the winner receives a GuideDAO Pass (NFT) for platform access.
about.bullet_admin: Safety levers: admins may extend deadlines or cancel if participation is too low, with refunds.
about.bullet_status: Live updates: real-time timer, status, and on-chain events visible in the app.
about.note: This is an educational initiative by GuideDAO students aiming for production-ready quality.

open.title: Open-source & Transparent
open.desc: The lottery runs on Ethereum-compatible networks via smart contracts.

vrf.title: Fair Randomness (VRF)
vrf.desc: Winner is selected using verifiable randomness for trustworthy results.

refund.title: Refund Before End
refund.desc: Participants can exit and refund tickets before the lottery ends.

nft.title: NFT Pass Reward
nft.desc: The winner receives a GuideDAO Pass (NFT) granting platform access.

admin.title: Admin Safeguards
admin.desc: Admins may extend deadlines or cancel for low participation with refunds.

status.title: Live Status & Events
status.desc: Real-time timer, status and on-chain events are shown in the app.

admin.title: Admin Panel
